olympus.title: Olympus OMD
olympus.description: While working at AKQA, we developed a global responsive website to support OMD product launch. Responsive across devices, in 18 separate language and location combinations. Integration with PHP content management system.

brd.title: BRDesign Associates
brd.description: BRDesign Associates, custom interior design firm website running on PyroCMS Backend.

fireworks.title: HTML5 Canvas Fireworks
fireworks.description: HTML5 Canvas Experiment of pixelated fireworks. HTML5 Attributes such as input used to change firework speed, diameter, and size, on a full page Canvas element.

verizon.title: Verizon Wireless
verizon.description: Nationwide iPad specific web app developed while working at AKQA for in-store salesmen. Custom app experiences made for product launches, Spanish language localization, and storegating for location specific Verizon Stores.

schorreats.title: Schorr Eats
schorreats.description: Custom restaurant tally-keeping webapp to track visited restaurants. Running on Node server, MongoDB for data storage, and AngularJS on the front.

three.title: Three Elevate
three.description: Google Maps API x ThreeJS Mashup that lets you pick two places on earth, and displays the elevation path across points on ThreeJS Canvas
